content:
@everyone
Hi everyone,

Please take a moment to complete the GloRuWriClu Sign Up form. It will help us gage the size of cohort we will have.

Also, there has been an update to the description of Monthly Sprints in the doc, so please take a look at the example which illustrates what will happen during weekly and monthly meetings.
https://hackmd.io/69FQfH3PSOSJA3GHQ-5R2w

Thanks!
